column4: I have a question. What does backport mean? What does it mean when someone backports something from edgy repos into dapper because it is newer?
a backport is when a newer version of something that is in edgy is build for dapper
I see. Can anybody do it? Does it require a developer? Any special/technical skills?
I suppose you could try, but the official backports are all by the official ubuntu developerrs
